Our Courses

Home/Courses
Basic Noraani Qaida

"Noorani Qaida" is an Exceptionl book used on a large scale to help Read Arabic, Recite & memorize the Quran thorugh a simle & effective method with proper Tajweed rules for Biggners Kids & Adults. Noorani Qaida is the most effecient fundamental curriculum specially planned for Begginers to learn recitation and memorization of Holy Quran

Learn Quran Recitation

We offer an exceptional online Quran Recitation course that caters to individuals of all ages & levels offer experties.Our team of expert Quran Tutor will help & guide you leran to memorize Quran in the easiest way for both Kids & Adults. These online Quran classes are well organized to help you Complete memorizing of Quran.

Learn Tajweed Rules

Tajweed rules means to recite every letter of the Quran correctly from its makhraj with all of its qualities. The importance of tajweed can't be denied as reciting the Quran without tajweed will not only effect the beauty of the Quran but sometimes it can change the meaning of the Quran.

Namaz for kids

Learn Namaz step by step with Arabic text & pictures guidance in English for begginers Muslim Kids, Adults. Learn how to make wudhu/abulation & all dua's for Namaz.

Duas/Short Prayers

Masnoon Duain are recited for every single purpose.There is no any time of dua, you can recite these daily routine duaen everytime and everywhere in the world.All these are Godly aims-may Allah be pleased.

Ahadiths for Kids

Ahadiths are like treasures that guide Muslims to be the best versions of themselves. Muslims love and respect Prophet Muhammad, and they try their best to follow his good example in their daily lives.They teach us about kindness, honesty, and being helpful to others.

Names of Allah

Listening & reciting the Names of Allah respectively are key to completing your memorization of them.Each & everyone of them with a unique definition, explanation & purpose.Allah has ninet-nine names, & whoever knows them will go to Paradise.

Names of Hazrat MUhammad (S.A.W)

The Holy Prophet Muhammad had many special names that Muslims use to show their love and respect. One of his names is 'Muhammad,' which means 'the praised one.' Another name is 'Ahmad,' which means 'the most praiseworthy.' People also call him 'Rasulullah,' which means 'the Messenger of Allah.'

Basic islamic Knowledge for Kids

Islam is a religion followed by many people around the world. Muslims believe in one God, called Allah. Islam teaches five important things called the Five Pillars.Muslims value kindness, peace, and helping others in their community. etc.

6 Kalima's

The Six Kalimas are short and special words that Muslims learn to show their faith and love for Allah. They are like little prayers that remind us of important beliefs. Muslims say these Kalimas with love and respect to strengthen their connection with Allah and follow their faith.

Prophet Stories

Prophet stories are fascinating tales about special people chosen by Allah to guide and help others. These stories are like valuable lessons that teach us important values and inspire us to be good, just like the Prophets were.

) } export default Courses
